price: Sabei que Allah é Veemente na punição e que Allah é Perdoador, Misericordiador.
arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: iʿ'lamū anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi wa-anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
